CustomField.formula: IF(AND( Name = bpats__ATS_Template_Stage__r.Name, TEXT(bpats__Stage_Type__c) = TEXT(bpats__ATS_Template_Stage__r.bpats__Stage_Type__c), bpats__Sequence__c = bpats__ATS_Template_Stage__r.bpats__Sequence__c, bpats__Block_Multiple_Candidates__c = bpats__ATS_Template_Stage__r.bpats__Block_Multiple_Candidates__c, bpats__Interview_Stage__c = bpats__ATS_Template_Stage__r.bpats__Interview_Stage__c ), true, false )
CustomField.label: Is Synced
